text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int i , arr [ n ] , b [ n ] , sum = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] ) ; b [ 0 ] = 1 ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( arr [ i - 1 ] <= arr [ i ] ) b [ i ] = b [ i - 1 ] + 1 ; else b [ i ] = 1 ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) sum = sum + b [ i ] ; printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
